note:
#Ecosystem #Science and Impacts of #Climate Change; #Forest Ecology; #Biodiversity.
#Ecosystem #Ecology group at the Swiss Federal Research Institute WSL; Professor at ETH Zurich, Switzerland.

I’m a college professor immersed in #teaching and #ecology. I visit lots of places, combine observations and simple experiments, and look for generalities. I called this Geographical Ecology but it is now de facto #GlobalChangeBiology. I’m a slow but voracious #reader of #Books, mainly #Novels, #Biography, and #History, and an inexpert but avid practitioner of #gardening. I know more about the #Beatles than is healthy.
